nodes.text: Harez Bant was a Human male Spy who worked for the Republic Strategic Information Service during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, Harez fell in love with Gann Sakoal's wife, Kelara. After Kelara turned against the Empire and her husband, Harez was able to steal the plans to an experimental blaster that Gann developed for the Empire. Eventually, Gann discovered this and tasked an Imperial spacer deal with the spy. As the Imperial spacer found Bant in the Sunken Sarlacc cantina in Sobrik, Harez engaged the Imperial and was killed.
Harez Bant is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Nolan North.
